title: Medu Vada
ingredients:
Urad dal (split black gram) – 1 cup (soaked for 4-5 hours)
Green chilies – 1-2 (finely chopped)
Ginger – 1 tsp (finely chopped or grated)
Black peppercorns – ½ tsp (optional, crushed or whole)
Curry leaves – 1 sprig (chopped)
Asafoetida (Hing) – 1 pinch
Salt – to taste
Water – as needed (very little, just for grinding)
Oil – for deep frying
instructions: Soak urad dal for 4–5 hours, grind it into a thick, fluffy batter, and mix with chopped ginger, chilies, curry leaves, salt, and spices. Shape into doughnuts and deep fry in hot oil until golden and crispy.
